result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Augustine T Allen Jr.

defendant.name: Allen, Augustine T, Jr.
defendant.address: 2176 Wildcat Lane, P.O. Box 323, Lac du Flambeau, WI 54538

records.addlTxt: Pre-trial conference on December 2, 2022 at 10:00 am.
Motion hearing on July 25, 2022 at 02:00 pm.

Appearances:
State appears by DA Karl Hayes via Zoom video.
Defendant appears via Zoom video from the Vilas County Jail.
Attorney Courtney Jolin does not appear.

Date and time set for a Motion Hearing (Bond Modification).
DA Hayes makes statement regarding Defendant being accepted into Treatment to Wellness Court, but needs to be out of custody to do so. DA Hayes drafted motions to modify the defendant's bonds.

COURT addresses what happens if Defendant does not complete treatment.
DA Hayes makes statements.
COURT grants bond modification.

COURT ORDERS: the cash bonds on all files are modified to a $1,000.00 signature bond on each. All non-monetary conditions are to remain the same for all files.

ADJOURNED: 1:37p.m
Status hearing on August 15, 2022 at 08:45 am.
Motion hearing on June 29, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

ADDRESS INFO for Augustine T Allen Jr.
Current: 2176 Wildcat Lane, P.O. Box 323, Lac du Flambeau, WI 54538   (Effective: 03-04-2022)
Prior: 938 Elks Point Lane, Apt. 635 PO Box 323, Lac du Flambeau, WI 54538

records.descr: Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Defendant
Application for specific judicial assign approved

records.addlTxt: Defendant Augustine T Allen Jr. appeared by video in the Vilas County Jail with Attorney Jolin.  Attorney Karl Peter Hayes appeared in court for State of Wisconsin. Attorney Jolin received the complaint and waives reading of the complaint. Attorney Jolin waives preliminary hearing. Waiver of preliminary hearing.  Rights given.  Court finds defendant is making a knowing and voluntary waiver of right to preliminary examination.  Court finds probable cause.  Bound over for arraignment on an information.  State files information in court and provides copies to defense.  Defense waives reading of information.  Not guilty plea entered by court.  Bond continued. Court discloses conflict.  Parties waive conflict. Court accepts waiver. Court sets pre trial for April 5th at 2:30 pm.

no to be on the premises with the 900 block of Elks Point Ln. Apt 635, Maintain absolute sobriety.
22-002517

Defendant Augustine T. Allen Jr. appeared by video in the Vilas County Jail with Attorney Jolin by zoom. DA Hayes appears in court for the State of Wisconsin. Court finds probable cause of criminal activity committed. Court sets $250.00 cash bond. Conditions, no to be on the premises with the 900 block of Elks Point Ln. Apt 635, Maintain absolute sobriety. Court sets initial appearance on March 4th at 1:00 pm.
